revised_title: The Controversy on the Torque on a Magnet in a Permeable Fluid
tldr: The author investigates the controversy surrounding the torque on a magnet immersed in a permeable fluid. They provide a simple and unambiguous calculation of the torque and discuss why other calculations give incorrect answers. The study focuses on a soft ellipsoidal magnet and its field distribution in a permeable medium, resolving the ongoing debate on the correct formulation for the torque on a magnet.
